idea: Tesseract Global is a managed IT services provider that helps to bridge business needs with affordable IT solutions by leveraging Cloud, Network Services, IT Professional services, IT Security and other Cognitive Technologies for their growth.
name: TESSERACT GLOBAL TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Accex supply chain is an end-to-end logistics solutions design and implementation company with a strong focus on digitization, sustainability, and operations excellence. We are a team of professionals with vast experience in the supply chain domain across various verticals and industries.


We bring world class solutions to Indian enterprises that want to compete globally and exceed in their customers expectation with right technology and sustainability initiatives. We provide global expertise with personalization, flexibility, and nimbleness of an unorganized player with full HSSE compliance. We are an extended arm of our customers partnering with them in their journey of supply chain excellence.

Solutions we provide –

1. Consolidation Solutions for Export, import & domestic cargo– Bonded and Free Trade Warehousing Zone based solutions, Clearance, Export Consolidation Centers, Port Logistics

2. Fulfillment Solutions – Warehousing Operations and Infra, e-commerce logistics (B2B and B2C), Cold chain warehousing, Chemical Warehousing

3. 4PL – End to end supply chain solution design and management, Complete Operations outsourcing – Line Feeding, Project Logistics for ODC cargo including insurance, clearance and sea/air freight, ship chartering, accounting
& credit control, O2C (order to cash management) with relevant compliances

and documentation and P2P (procure to pay management)


4. Transport solutions – First Mile, Last Mile, over dimensional cargo movement, Container logistics

5. Value Added Services – Packaging, Repackaging, Repair, quality control, Order to cash management, compliance management, marketing and branding, sustainability audits

6. Technology Solutions – Inventory Management, Warehouse Management, Transport Management, Scheduling, Dispatch management, Automatic storage / Retrieval Systems, Warehouse Automation, Contract Management, Customer Service Management
name: ACCEX SUPPLY CHAIN AND WAREHOUSING PRIVATE LIMITED
TELR PAYMENT SOLUTIONS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
